title: Bug 17894 - Open Mode pref not reset by Restore Defaults
OB: After changing the Open Mode to Single Click and selecting both checkboxes in the Workbench preferences, clicking on 'Restore Defaults' does not revert the Open Mode to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.
EB: Clicking on 'Restore Defaults' in the Workbench preferences should revert the Open Mode to Double Click and clear both checkboxes.
SR:
1. Open the Workbench preferences.
2. Change the Open Mode to Single Click and select both checkboxes.
3. Click on 'Restore Defaults' button.
4. Verify that the Open Mode is reverted to Double Click and both checkboxes are cleared.
